Workflow.Name: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v3 (Orphaned Users)
Workflow.Description: This flow checks the status of all entries in the Power Platform Users table and updates them based on, for example, if they are deleted or disabled.

LocalizedName.description: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v3 (Orphaned Users)

Description.description: This flow checks the status of all entries in the Power Platform Users table and updates them based on, for example, if they are deleted or disabled.
